project.name: C-C476A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C476A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Reads file name of a csv containing 3, fully quoted, comma separated, columns.Opens file and reads each value and sets it to index in array. If a value isn'tfully quoted program will skip that value and eventually seg fault when dereferencingarray index for printing

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C476A-GREP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Reads file name of a csv containing 3, fully quoted, comma separated, columns.Opens file and reads each value and sets it to index in array. If a value isn'tfully quoted program will skip that value and eventually seg fault when dereferencingarray index for printing

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_nzxhhVGLAjloyhyYLeAl AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_QyfdgBex9m OR segfault_code_hkqAECCM5t OR segfault_code_faLK3izPv0 OR segfault_code_0RPnL57bKf OR segfault_code_MZczvFFB17 OR segfault_msg_ARGhkoYyxU OR illegal_inst_msg_cXc9j5Llf4) AND NOT timeout_BuLxZZlHnC) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_QyfdgBex9m OR segfault_code_hkqAECCM5t OR segfault_code_faLK3izPv0 OR segfault_code_0RPnL57bKf OR segfault_code_MZczvFFB17 OR segfault_msg_ARGhkoYyxU OR illegal_inst_msg_cXc9j5Llf4) OR timeout_BuLxZZlHnC OR controlled_exit_hlTNLNVL9Q)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_QyfdgBex9m OR segfault_code_hkqAECCM5t OR segfault_code_faLK3izPv0 OR segfault_code_0RPnL57bKf OR segfault_code_MZczvFFB17 OR segfault_msg_ARGhkoYyxU OR illegal_inst_msg_cXc9j5Llf4) AND NOT timeout_BuLxZZlHnC) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_QyfdgBex9m OR segfault_code_hkqAECCM5t OR segfault_code_faLK3izPv0 OR segfault_code_0RPnL57bKf OR segfault_code_MZczvFFB17 OR segfault_msg_ARGhkoYyxU OR illegal_inst_msg_cXc9j5Llf4) OR timeout_BuLxZZlHnC OR controlled_exit_hlTNLNVL9Q))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_kv6hWdHOux OR segfault_code_qnVe8yWekt OR segfault_code_wUmxL0fNbk OR segfault_code_UgVcMvrZqb OR segfault_code_N5bcufQb6v OR segfault_msg_mCYi2jMDjt OR illegal_inst_msg_gJU9fjgCen) AND NOT timeout_iKML8sQdGf) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_kv6hWdHOux OR segfault_code_qnVe8yWekt OR segfault_code_wUmxL0fNbk OR segfault_code_UgVcMvrZqb OR segfault_code_N5bcufQb6v OR segfault_msg_mCYi2jMDjt OR illegal_inst_msg_gJU9fjgCen) OR timeout_iKML8sQdGf OR controlled_exit_wkAI8LmVOg))
